title: Thunderbird Primary Password Help
content:
Hi there,

My grandmother on this account keeps receiving a enter primary password alert on her Thunderbird / Bigpond account. We've tried everything and when following the prompts to reset (tools > developer tools > etc) it won't come up with the evaluate button or reset button. We've tried the online sources but no success and she can't access her emails on her desktop. Please let me know what we can do !
creator: sonjonev

title: Unable to install addons in Thunderbird 115
content:
Thunderbird 115.0 on Linux/Debian is unable to verify and install addons from website. It just freezes when I try - and cannot even manually install addons that I download using Chrome. I even totally deleted all files and folders and reinstalled Thunderbird 115.0 from stratch... what happened?!

I found that after total removal - if I install a earlier version... that I can verify and install addons, but not with version 115.

I also found that I cannot import profiles from zip or even uncompressed folder. I confirmed the profile is less that 2 gig (1.2 gig) - so size of the profile should not be a problem.
creator: spaceknight2

title: overi-ride yahoo spam filter
content: pls include code to move all remote server spam content to its inbox [not spam] so thunderbird can do the filtering, and i don't have two or more servers to deal with. thx.
creator: rjp7

title: When I click (compose) 'New Message' the new message window auto minimizes to the Task Bar
content:
I have a new installation of Thunderbird Supernova and when I click (compose) 'New Message' the new message window auto minimizes to the Windows 11 Task Bar and can't be maximized i.e. I can't compose a new message.

I can read and respond to incoming emails as normal.

I'm an experienced Thunderbird user - over many years and devices.
creator: tahmoor223

content:

I think this happend since an thunderbird update.

Can you tell me, how to fix this problem, or can you recommend me a former stable version?

title: e-mail
content: Just recently when I open an e-mail I get multiple threads, how do I turn this facility off so I only view messages individually from a particular e-mail.

title: Mail Address Auto Suggestion
content: I have recently set up and started using Thunderbird with all four of my email accounts. However, when composing an email in the "To" field, I find myself having to manually enter the full email addresses of recipients. Is there a way to access my address book from the imported emails to streamline this process?
creator: akashk1

title: Gmail account won't save when added
content:
Hi,

I'm having a issue with the current Thunderbird not saving my Gmail account when added.

So, I add it, when I close Thunderbird down and reboot it the Gmail account is gone.

I have three other accounts working fine (A domain name, a Hotmail, and a different Gmail account)

Any idea's?

gat.
creator: gat58

title: Need help I have missing folders in moved directory
content: I had an issue with one of my domain emails hosted at ionos so I removed one of my domain accounts and reinstalled it I let is set up with default storage diorectory user/appdata and so on then went to sever settings and changed the local directory to the hard drive my other emails are stored on the only thing is I'm missing all the folders in the directory but my emails are still working. does any one know how I can fix this as I said I have already tried to remove the account and reinstall it and it still come up the same i have included an image of both accounts hosted at ionos not that that should make a differance where its hosted just that they should look the same in the directory!. thanks to any one who could shed some light on this. as you can see there are folders in one but theri missing the ones on the right. shame there is no little app from mozilla that can fix issues like this in thunderbird it would solve so many little issues that seem to pop up now and again.
creator: dow

title: Emails using Thunderbird won't 'Send.'
content: Since October 18, 2023, emails using Thunderbird will not 'Send.' My nephew, who is very good at technology since that's his job, did change my Inbox to 'imap' from 'pop' as that's the direction my server, Spectrum (aka Charter) has gone, so I'm receiving messages. I"ve called Spectrum twice, but they haven't been able to help me, as their people aren't well versed in third-party servers. The 'Send' is still a problem, which he thinks is something going on between Thunderbird and Spectrum's server. Please advise. Thank you.
creator: johnandjeanp

title: Can't get my old Profile to work
content:
I have a new installation of Windows and want to get my old Profile attached to my new installation of Thunderbird. In the past, I have done it multiple times on various new computers but can't seem to get it working this time.

My old setup (and what I want on the new one, too) was: 

  - I had multiple email accounts set up on Thunderbird within the same Profile   - my Profile was stored on my D: Drive (to save space)

I have installed a fresh copy of Thunderbird onto D Drive. I have copied my old Profiles folder (from C:/Users...) to the new Thunderbird folder on my C drive

When I then open Thunderbird, it asks to set up a new email again and no sign of my old Profiles. I'm missing something and I'm pretty sure it has to do with my old Profile being on the D drive (and that's where I still want it)
creator: lincoBC

title: How to restore Thunderbird?
content:
Earlier this week, when Thunderbird updated, I lost access to Thunderbird on my PC. The program is not on my PC. However, I can still get my email on my iPhone and the cloud.

How should I restore Thunderbird? Should I just download and reinstall it? I just want to make sure I still have access to all my old emails and contacts.

Thanks! (a long time Thunderbird user)
creator: jkepner

title: How to set "Helper Applications" for opening attachements in Thunderbird 115 Supernova
content:
For some reason Thunderbird 115 Supernova has lost the ability to open attached files. The menu that comes up when I ask to open attached files no longer has the appropriate application available, see attached screenshots, how do I fix this?

I am using Ubuntu 22.04 with a Plasma desktop.
creator: kim32

title: Unable to send messages
content: Since the update yesterday (1st December) neither my wife nor I (on different machines) have been able to send emails - the response is "login to server failed"
